selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to match the required output format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the answer in the format 'Answer: ...'.

new_skill_specs.name: identify_angle_in_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Identify and verify the measure of a specific angle in a geometric diagram.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The measure of the angle as a float.
edge_cases: The angle label is not visible or obscured.
Multiple angles with the same label.

new_skill_specs.name: map_value_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map a numeric value to the corresponding multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the correct option.
edge_cases: Value does not match any option.
Multiple options with the same value.
